meanings.definition: Warmth and friendliness in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her cordiality towards new students made them feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with cordiality as old friends reunited.
meanings.sent3: His cordiality was so contagious that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The cordiality of the small town enveloped visitors like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The cordiality of the host made the event unforgettable.
